channel.title: dashboard on Jirong's sandbox
channel.description: Recent content in dashboard on Jirong's sandbox

item.title: Investment compass
item.description: Investment Compass (Kindly wait 10 seconds for the entire app to load. Best viewed in Desktop) This serves as a compass for me to visualize the potential returns given the % fall from 52 week high. See my linkedin article here for further explanation on why I think this is a good indicator. The app consists of 3 tabs. The ‘Visualize’ tab contains 3 graphs plotting % fall from 52 week high against the expected returns 1 to 3 years later.

item.title: Rolling out the Investment Compass interactive app that I promised eons ago
item.description: Finally I had some time to sit down to work on the interactive app. From what was an hideous app to a somewhat Minimum Viable Product (MVP) version of an app. (Shhh…I’m not really a User Interface, UI person). This serves as a compass for me to visualize the potential returns given the % fall from 52 week high. See my linkedin article here for further explanation on why I think this is a good indicator.
